thread.title: Pence avoids encounter with North Korean official as Olympics begin | North Korean Insight

title: Pence avoids encounter with North Korean official as Olympics begin | North Korean Insight
text:
Pence avoids encounter with North Korean official as Olympics begin February 9, 2018 | Reuters | Shares: 0 
SEOUL/PYEONGCHANG, South Korea (Reuters) â€“ U.S. Vice President Mike Pence made only a brief appearance at a reception marking the start of the Winter Olympics on Friday, avoiding a potentially awkward encounter with the ceremonial leader of North Korea attending the same event.
